text: Head to Golden Hour and meet with the Crew

title: Mission Description
content: Firefly has confessed her innermost thoughts to you. No matter how you feel about it, it is time for you to say farewell... However, you can still walk the last part of this journey together.Head to Golden Hour and return to reality to reunite with everyone.

speaker: (Trailblazer)
line: ▶ (Come to think of it, I wonder if I have to go to the hotel to return to reality...)

speaker: (Trailblazer)
line: ▶ (Sampo? Is that guy up to no good again?)

speaker: Sampo
line: It looks like you have not taken my warnings to heart... A pity. Are you so enchanted by that girl?

speaker: Firefly
line: ...Careful. I'm more than certain now that there's something not right about this friend of yours.

speaker: Sampo
line: Oho, this brave little girl appears to be protecting you. I wonder why? Are you two that close?

speaker: Sampo
line: I love your attitude, my dear. I have to admit you're different from your friend here — your senses are much sharper.

speaker: Sampo
line: Even so, you are lagging far behind the main party. Have you not noticed yet? What The Family is hiding, the secret behind this sweet dream.

speaker: Sampo
line: And as for you — the Trailblazer who saved the Ice World... I wonder how many things Sampo glossed over when recounting the happenings on Jarilo-VI ? Oh well, it was my problem for trusting him...

children.speaker: Sampo?
children.line: Why don't you rest for a little while...

title: Step Description
content: As expected, returning to reality isn't as simple as you expected — Firefly and you are attacked by Sampo as soon as you arrive at the Golden Hour. Before you lose consciousness, you see Sampo shift into what appears to be the figure of a woman... Either he's a habitual crossdresser, or your assailant is actually someone else.Just who is she? Unfortunately, you don't have time to think about this right now — that girl has cast an illusion on you and sent you to a mysterious location. It would be best to find a way to escape from this place before anything.

speaker: (Trailblazer)
line: ▶ (I'm back at the hotel? No, this feeling... The surroundings look a little like I just entered a dream...)

text: Messages The Astral Express Family Himeko Looks like a trip back to reality is overdue Let's meet up in my room I've run into a little trouble... (Trailblazer) I've run into a little trouble... (Message failed to send) Huh... (Trailblazer) Huh... (Message failed to send)

line: So quiet... nothing but the tick-tocking of the clocks...
Tick tock... tick tock... tick tock...

title: Step Description
content: As expected, returning to reality isn't as simple as you expected — Firefly and you are attacked by Sampo as soon as you arrive at the Golden Hour. Before you lose consciousness, you see Sampo shift into what appears to be the figure of a woman... Either he has always had a petite feminine build, or your assailant is actually someone else.You find Firefly in the mysterious space — It seems the stranger didn't leave her alone, either. Now, you can look for the way out together.

speaker: Firefly
line: ▶ Ah... (Trailblazer)! So you're really here too...

speaker: Firefly
line: In any case, we must still be in a dream. It can't be anywhere else, much less reality... I'm never wrong about the distinctive sense of memoria that's in the air.

speaker: Firefly
line: But this is very different from the "sweet dream" that I'm familiar with — suffocating... silent... uneasy... And these floating words. Can you see them too? This kind of place would never exist on Penacony under the provision of The Family. So, could this be a dream bubble...?

speaker: Firefly
line: No, that's not right. Do you remember, before we were unconscious, that friend of yours said: The real Dreamscape ...

children.speaker: Firefly
children.line: I'm not sure. Everything happened so quickly. But regardless, The Family must be hiding something — something about the truth of the Dreamscape...

children.speaker: Firefly
children.line: I'm not sure. Everything happened so quickly. But regardless, The Family must be hiding something — something about the truth of the Dreamscape...

children.speaker: Firefly
children.line: I should've been wary of him sooner... Sorry. Regardless, The Family must be hiding something — something about the truth behind the Dreamscape...

speaker: Firefly
line: And, you probably noticed it when you woke up as well — the ticking of clocks all around us... My gut tells me that the secret hidden here is also linked to that mysterious Watchmaker.

speaker: Firefly
line: If it points us towards the Watchmaker's Legacy, it will be connected to everyone who is melded to Penacony's dream...

speaker: Firefly
line: ▶ Let's go, (Trailblazer)... We have to move — be it to find an exit, or the truth.

text: Find an exit from the mysterious space

line: I see... Are we playing hide-and-seek?

speaker: Firefly
line: We can't get through here. Let's take the way around from the side.
Ready or not? Here I come.

speaker: Firefly
line: Dead-end here too... Given the layout of the room, are they really suggesting we maneuver around using the walls?

text: Search for an exit from the room

speaker: Firefly
line: Can't believe that worked. Tampering with the Dreamscape's gravity is clearly strictly forbidden...

speaker: Firefly
line: ...Careful, there are some strange things on the wall... And they don't look like they're from the Dreamjolt Troupe...

text: Continue to search the room for an exit

line: Can't find you... Can't find you anywhere...
Where are you... Where could you be...

speaker: Firefly
line: The exit... is on the other side? How're we going to cross over...
Do you have something to tell me?

speaker: Firefly
line: Incredible... This is really a sight that can only be witnessed in a dream...

speaker: Firefly
line: These words have been appearing and then vanishing persistently for awhile now. Whose thoughts are they? And who is this Mikhail...

text: There is a sadness to this...
Mikhail... Where have I heard this name...

speaker: Firefly
line: It's like I can feel... emotions contained within them. Confusion... fear... sadness... and others so faint I can barely feel them...

speaker: Firefly
line: Unyielding resolve in the face of death...
Why did you come here specifically?
Mikhail, you look like you've got something on your mind...
Take me with you at least

speaker: Firefly
line: That was a close one... but we made it.

speaker: Firefly
line: So strange... The Family insist that the Dreamscape is absolutely safe.

speaker: Firefly
line: There's nothing but... a jigsaw puzzle here.

speaker: Firefly
line: The pieces look like they flew to both sides of the room.

title: Step Description
content: As expected, returning to reality isn't as simple as you expected — Firefly and you are attacked by Sampo as soon as you arrive at the Golden Hour. Before you lose consciousness, you see Sampo shift into what appears to be the figure of a woman... Either he's a habitual crossdresser, or your assailant is actually someone else.As you are about to reach the end of this space, you see a Dreamweaver gentleman holding a puzzle, within which lies the key to your escape.

line: I will definitely keep it safe.
So, you need to keep yourself safe, too...
This is an origami bird I made for you...

text: The red bird jumps out eagerly, but it seems you aren't the person it's waiting for.
The bird ruffles its feathers in disappointment and flies away.

line: It will protect you from harm.

speaker: Firefly
line: This should fill in the empty spaces in the puzzle.

text: Use the characteristics of the Dreamscape to open the door

title: Step Description
content: As expected, returning to reality isn't as simple as you expected — Firefly and you are attacked by Sampo as soon as you arrive at the Golden Hour. Before you lose consciousness, you see Sampo shift into what appears to be the figure of a woman... Either he's a habitual crossdresser, or your assailant is actually someone else.As you are about to reach the end of this space, you see a Dreamweaver gentleman holding a puzzle and use him to open the door to the exit. Continue onwards.

speaker: Firefly
line: Ah! The wall has vanished... Feels like we're reaching the end... right?

title: Step Description
content: As expected, returning to reality isn't as simple as you expected — Firefly and you are attacked by Sampo as soon as you arrive at the Golden Hour. Before you lose consciousness, you see Sampo shift into what appears to be the figure of a woman... Either he's a habitual crossdresser, or your assailant is actually someone else.You arrive in a room with a strange atmosphere. An unguarded treasure box lies in front of you, waiting for you to open it... Will you open it?

speaker: Firefly
line: Er... Just one chest? I'm sure that's not a trap. Should we open it...?

speaker: Firefly
line: ...What's going on!? The lights have all turned on. So creepy...

speaker: Firefly
line: But, since there are so many doors here... we should be able to leave through one of them...

text: Leave this place through any portal

title: Step Description
content: As expected, returning to reality isn't as simple as you expected — Firefly and you are attacked by Sampo as soon as you arrive at the Golden Hour. Before you lose consciousness, you see Sampo shift into what appears to be the figure of a woman... Either he's a habitual crossdresser, or your assailant is actually someone else.Only after you have opened the chest do you discover several great doors surrounding you... Perhaps you can use one of these doors to leave this place.

text: (After walking through the hallway and entering the room)
Leave this place through another portal
(After walking through the hallway and entering the room)

speaker: Firefly
line: This again... No wait, could it be...

text: Find a way to leave this suspicious space

title: Step Description
content: As expected, returning to reality isn't as simple as you expected — Firefly and you are attacked by Sampo as soon as you arrive at the Golden Hour. Before you lose consciousness, you see Sampo shift into what appears to be the figure of a woman... Either he's a habitual crossdresser, or your assailant is actually someone else.It seems you have returned to a familiar place... What is going on?

text: (After walking through the hallway and entering the room)

speaker: Firefly
line: Uh oh... Which one was the original door?

text: Continue your search for a way to leave this suspicious place
(After walking through the hallway and entering the room)

speaker: Firefly
line: The TVs are so bright, it's hurting my eyes... Careful, something's up...

title: Step Description
content: As expected, returning to reality isn't as simple as you expected — Firefly and you are attacked by Sampo as soon as you arrive at the Golden Hour. Before you lose consciousness, you see Sampo shift into what appears to be the figure of a woman... Either he's a habitual crossdresser, or your assailant is actually someone else.You are trapped in this suspicious room and encounter a terrifying memetic monster... Can you really defeat it?

text:
(Cutsceneplays)
(Begin battle againstMemory Zone Meme "Something Unto Death")

speaker: Firefly
line: This Monster—— all these creatures——are they the secret The Family is hiding?

speaker: Firefly
line: Ugh, is there no way to lose it...!?

children.line: If you don't know the right technique...
you might never return from the shadow of Death...

text: (Resume battle againstMemory Zone Meme "Something Unto Death")

speaker: Black Swan
line: Easy, girl. I'm on your side.

speaker: Black Swan
line: You can call me... the Memokeeper, Black Swan.
